name: Ninja - waltz of night
abstract: Night falls, wolves howl; seize your sword, brave one! This standalone game offers thrilling hack-and-slash action. Use sound cues to locate enemies, engage in close combat or unleash ranged attacks.

detail.app_developer: 上海云上花火软件工作室
detail.app_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, German, Russian, Japanese, French, Spanish

detail.app_release_note:
New rhythm mode, using music to drive game levels, supporting players to upload music to generate levels
Add a pause function during the game, activate it using the left hand (-) or (Pico) keys
Adjusting player feedback levels 5/6/7 is too difficult, reducing the difficulty of these three levels
Adjusting the game interface and skill icons
Trailer Adventure ModeYou can try a simple little level in this version
In the newly added adventure mode, there is a treasure chest monster that can eat people, as a tribute to Xin Shi Ji Fulian
Music import tool, please download from https://gitee.com/skyfirework/Toolkit Download, regularly maintain and supplement graphic and textual explanations in the future
